meanings.sent1: The doers in our community help others in need.
meanings.sent2: The doers at the event organized everything efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The doers in the kitchen were busy preparing a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: The doers on the team were the driving force behind our success.
meanings.sent5: The doers in the garden made it bloom with colorful flowers.

meanings.definition: Those who take action or perform tasks
meanings.sent1: Doers in the company always find solutions to challenges.
meanings.sent2: The doers in the group completed the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The doers in the office made the workplace lively and productive.
meanings.sent4: The doers in the classroom were eager to learn and participate.
meanings.sent5: The doers in the neighborhood organized a successful clean-up event.
